CmdLine: apt-get update        && apt-get install -y       		telnet       		p7zip       		python-minimal       		vim       		xmlstarlet       && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*       && curl -o /usr/local/bin/gosu -Lks https://github.com/tianon/gosu/releases/download/1.2/gosu-amd64       && curl -o /usr/local/bin/gosu.asc -sL https://github.com/tianon/gosu/releases/download/1.2/gosu-amd64.asc       && gpg --keyserver pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys B42F6819007F00F88E364FD4036A9C25BF357DD4       && gpg --verify /usr/local/bin/gosu.asc       && rm /usr/local/bin/gosu.asc       && chmod +x /usr/local/bin/gosu
